title: Revolutionary skin-tight spacesuit is designed to mimic the effects of gravity on the body
text:
Revolutionary skin-tight spacesuit is designed to mimic the effects of gravity on the body 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
To help combat the effects of microgravity on astronauts, Dr. James Waldie developed a skintight spacesuit capable of mimicking the effects ...
